text: Germán Rivero (born 12 March 1992 in Argentina) is an Argentinean footballer who now plays for Club Atlético Alvarado in his home country.El delantero Germán Rivero, es nuevo jugador de Alvarado Alvarado UNIDO (Facebook) ==Career== Rivero started his senior career with CSD Flandria. In 2016. he signed for Club Plaza Colonia de Deportes in the Uruguayan Primera División, where he made seventeen league appearances and scored eight goals.at Soccerway After that, he played for Unión La Calera, Defensor Sporting, Apollon Smyrni, and Club Atlético Alvarado, where he now plays. == References == == External links == * The story of Germán Rivero: the Argentine champion with Plaza Colonia, the Uruguayan Leicester * Germán Rivero: the return * From the Argentine promotion to be the top scorer of the Uruguayan champion * The 9 that went to C with Flandria and was champion in Uruguay Category:1992 births Category:Argentine footballers Category:Club Atlético Alvarado players Category:Living people
title: Germán Rivero
